General.Name: Ningbo Fangzheng Automobile Mould Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Ningbo Fangzheng Automobile Mould Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of automotive plastic molds. It offers bumper, dashboard, door panel, console, low pressure injection, air conditioning and air filtering, precision mold, blow mold, and other series products. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Ninghai, China.
General.Address: Automobile Parts Industrial Park of No. 1, Ningbo, China

AddressData.Street: Automobile Parts Industrial Park of No. 1
